name: Xingjian Zhen
interests:
I'm Xingjian Zhen, a PhD. graduated from the Department of Computer Science at University of Wisconsin-Madison. My advisor is Prof. Vikas Singh. I also work closely with Rudrasis Chakraborty. Before that, I got my B.E. degree in Department of Electronic Engineering from Tsinghua University in 2017.

My research interest is Computer Vision, Deep learning, Differential Geometry, Statistics, and Medical Imaging. I am particularly interested in the application of deep learning in medical area. I feel AI+Medical will be the future of the hospital.

I have publication in NeurIPS, ICCV, CVPR, AAAI, ECCV etc. Till now, I have one Best Paper Award (in ECCV 2022), and two Oral presentations (in CVPR 2020, and CVPR 2021). Details can be found in my publication page or my google scholar page. I'm open to any kinds of collaboration. Please feel free to contact me directly through email.

I have joined Meta since 2024.

Previously I worked in Allen Institute for Brain Science from April 2023 to April 2024.
